questions.text: Does the individual have a basic skills need that can be met by JCP offer?
questions.name: basic-offer

questions.text: Is the individual doing any form of paid employment?
questions.name: paid-employmnet

questions.text: Has the individual previously been on the Work and Health programme?
questions.name: previous-whp

questions.text: Has the JCP offer already helped the individual with their core job search activity?
questions.hint: Core jobsearch activitiy includes basic job search skills, task such as CV writing, use of email and Universal Jobmatch.
questions.name: jcp-helped

questions.text: Do you consider that the individual will realistically find employmnet in the next twelve months with soley support of the JCP offer?
questions.name: sole-jcp

questions.text: Do you consider that the individual will realistically find employment in the next twelve months?
questions.name: next-twelve

questions.text: Do you consider the individual has a realistic job goal?
questions.name: realistic-goal

questions.text: Is there any other provision which would be more suited for the individual's needs and help them to find work?
questions.name: other-provision
